name: UE5 Side Scroller Game Blueprint
description:
This is my side scroller game project, without my created 3D asset. This project only have the blueprint. I thought someone want the blueprint project only. This is cheaper than compare to full project. I have the full project with Beautiful 100+ 3D asset. which you can change the texture and make like 400+ model. Now you can see what the blueprint only project have here. This project have intro and menu loop video, 20+ blueprint like menu, 3 different, walk, run, death, gun, fire, speed up , heard, kill, sound, drop, ninja blade, enemy canon Ai, save game, save high score, 16 different widget blueprint and more than 60+ overall blueprint 

Download the project from here: https://sifua.itch.io/ue5-side-scroller-game-blueprint 

Download only 3D Mesh project: https://sifua.itch.io/ue5-side-scroller-game-3d-asset 

Download the full Project: https://sifua.itch.io/ue5-side-scroller-game-with-3d-asset
